Title: The Card Player
Writer: Dario Argento (story), Franco Ferrini (story), Dario Argento (screenplay), Franco Ferrini (screenplay), Jay Benedict (dialogue), Phoebe Scholfield (dialogue)
Actors: Stefania Rocca, Liam Cunningham, Silvio Muccino, Adalberto Maria Merli
Plot: A Rome policewoman teams up with a British Interpol agent to find a crafty serial killer whom plays a taunting game of cat-and-mouse with the police by abducting and killing young women and showing it over an Internet web cam.
